title: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEAC6A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type AC6A model. The model represents field-controlled alternator-rectifier excitation systems with system-supplied electronic voltage regulators.  The maximum output of the regulator, , is a function of terminal voltage, . The field current limiter included in the original model AC6A remains in the 2005 update.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 6.6.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcIEEEAC6A

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 536. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K). Typical Value = 0.173. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (K).  Typical Value = 1.91. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1.6. Default: 0.0

kh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limiter gain (K).  Typical Value = 92. Default: 0.0

seve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.214. Default: 0.0

seve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.044. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.086. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 9. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

th.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limiter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

tj.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limiter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

tk.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -75. Default: 0.0

ve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V) equals V(V).  Typical Value = 7.4. Default: 0.0

ve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V).  Typical Value = 5.55. Default: 0.0

vfelim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limit reference (V).  Typical Value = 19. Default: 0.0

vhmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum field current limiter signal reference (V).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 44. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -36. Default: 0.0
